mapper.insert: insert into interviewinfo (intvinfo_sendtime,intvinfo_res_id,intvinfo_status,intvinfo_intv,intvinfo_intv_emp_id,intvinfo_tor_id,intvinfo_check) values (#{intvinfoSendtime},#{intvinfoResId},'未查看','未面试',0,#{intvinfoTorId},0)
mapper.select: select *from interviewinfo where intvinfo_intv_emp_id=#{empId} and intvinfo_intv='已面试' and intvinfo_check=0
mapper.update: update interviewinfo set intvinfo_intvtime=#{intvinfoIntvtime},intvinfo_status='已查看',intvinfo_intv_emp_id=#{intvinfoIntvEmpId} where intvinfo_res_id=#{intvinfoResId}
update interviewinfo set intvinfo_status='已查看' where intvinfo_id=#{infoId}
update interviewinfo set intvinfo_intv='已面试' where intvinfo_id=#{infoId}
update interviewinfo set intvinfo_check=1 where intvinfo_id=#{id}
